share.title: Share to earn more giveaway entries.

terms_page_content:
Giveaway Terms and Conditions

Official Rules

[Organization Name] (Address) will be running a giveaway as part of [Event Name] held from [Start Date] through [End Date]. [Organization Name] will be giving away various prizes during the event. Information on how to participate for a chance to win one of the prizes is below.

Eligibility

Age Requirement: Participants must be at least 18 years of age to enter the giveaway.

Event-Based Participation: The giveaway is open to virtual attendees of [Event Name]; no territorial restrictions apply beyond event attendance.

Entry Requirements

Method of Entry: Entry into the giveaway will be automatic upon filling out the registration form for [Event Name]. All participants will receive an email notification. Additional entries can be earned by referring people to register with your unique URL.

No Purchase Necessary: No purchase or payment of any kind is necessary to enter or win this giveaway.

Duration

Event Duration: The giveaway will take place during the event. Entries will be accepted from the start of the event until the designated end time of the giveaway.

Prizes

Prize Description: The prizes will include various items. The approximate retail value of the prizes will be specified.

Prize Conditions: The prizes are non-transferable, non-exchangeable, and non-refundable. No cash alternative will be offered. The prizes will be awarded "as is" with no warranty or guarantee, either express or implied.

Odds: The odds of winning the prize depend on the total number of eligible entries received.

Winner Selection and Notification

Selection Process: Winners will be selected in a random drawing from all eligible entries received during the event.

Notification: The winners will be announced after the event and contacted via email. If the initially selected winner does not reply within a specified time, another winner will be drawn in the same process until a winner is established.

Data Protection and Privacy

Use of Personal Information: By participating, entrants agree to the collection and use of their personal information for the purpose of administering the giveaway and for any other purposes to which they have consented.

Liability and Disputes

Limitation of Liability: By entering, participants release the organizer from any liability for any injuries, loss, or damage of any kind resulting from participation in the giveaway or acceptance, possession, or use/misuse of the prize.

General Conditions

Compliance with Laws: The giveaway is subject to all applicable laws and regulations. It is the entrant's responsibility to ensure compliance with any laws governing their participation. Void where prohibited.

Right to Modify: The organizer reserves the right to cancel, suspend, or modify the giveaway if any problem prevents the giveaway from being conducted as planned.
